author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald is a timeless masterpiece that delves into the decadence and disillusionment of the Jazz Age...

author: Harper Lee
review: A powerful and poignant tale of racial injustice and moral growth in the Deep South, seen through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling dystopian novel exploring the dangers of totalitarianism, surveillance, and loss of individuality.

author: J.D. Salinger
review: A coming-of-age story centered on Holden Caulfieldâ€™s exploration of identity, rebellion, and alienation in postwar America.

author: Jane Austen
review: A witty and romantic novel that critiques the British class system through the spirited relationship of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: A thrilling adventure of Bilbo Baggins as he joins a group of dwarves to reclaim treasure guarded by the dragon Smaug.

bookName: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
review: The magical journey of young wizard Harry Potter as he discovers his identity and battles dark forces at Hogwarts School.

author: Paulo Coelho
review: A philosophical tale about Santiago, a shepherd boy who follows his dreams to uncover his personal legend and spiritual treasure.

author: Paula Hawkins
review: A gripping psychological thriller that follows Rachel, who becomes entangled in a mysterious disappearance she believes she witnessed.

bookName: Developer Testing: Building Quality Into Software
author: Alexander Tarlinder
review: A practical guide for developers to write testable code, integrating software craftsmanship, unit testing, and refactoring to enhance code quality.

bookName: Coder to Developer: Tools and Strategies for Delivering Your Software
author: Mike Gunderloy
review: A comprehensive resource for coders transitioning to full software development, covering source control, unit testing, and project management.

author: Matt Frisbie
review: An in-depth guide to mastering JavaScript, covering ECMAScript 6 and 7, modern frameworks, and advanced techniques for professional web development.

bookName: Tesla: Inventor of the Electrical Age
author: W. Bernard Carlson
review: A detailed biography of Nikola Tesla, exploring his groundbreaking inventions in AC electricity and his visionary approach to technology.

bookName: Cricket Performance Management: Mathematical Formulation and Analytics
author: Hemanta Saikia, Dibyojyoti Bhattacharjee, Diganta Mukherjee
review: An analytical exploration of cricket performance using data mining and statistical tools to enhance decision-making in the sport.

bookName: 21st Century C: C Tips from the New School
author: Ben Klemens
review: A modern guide to C programming, covering updated techniques, tools, and libraries for building efficient applications.

bookName: An Introduction to Cryptocurrencies: The Crypto Market Ecosystem
author: Nikos Daskalakis, Panagiotis Georgitseas
review: A clear and concise introduction to cryptocurrencies, explaining blockchain, tokens, and their impact on the financial ecosystem.

bookName: Crypto Economy: How Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, and Token-Economy Are Disrupting the Financial World
author: Aries Wanlin Wang
review: An insightful exploration of how Bitcoin and blockchain are revolutionizing finance and commerce in the digital age.

bookName: Crypto Uncovered: The Evolution of Bitcoin and the Crypto Currency Marketplace
author: Sarah Swammy, Richard Thompson, Marvin Loh
review: A thorough examination of cryptocurrencies, their adoption, regulation, and potential to reshape global financial systems.

bookName: Choice Hacking: How to use psychology and behavioral science to create an experience that sings
author: Jennifer L. Clinehens
review: A practical guide to using behavioral science and psychology to design customer experiences that drive engagement and action.
